short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hillary likes when she's leading in the polls-plus forecast. Hover over a blue state to see her shimmy!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Go to the FiveThirtyEight forecast map and hover over a blue state to see Secretary Clinton shimmy.

http://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/2016-election-forecast/ 

The greater her lead, the bigger her shimmy!

Not affiliated with or endorsed by FiveThirtyEight or Hillary Clinton, but a fan of both.
